uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.processors

Class GigaScreenConverterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.silentsoftware.core.converters.image.processors.GigaScreenConverterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor

    public class GigaScreenConverterImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageProcessor
    A converter that wraps the GigaScreen logic around a base dithering converter.

      • getGigaScreenAttribute

        public GigaScreenAtrribute[][] getGigaScreenAttribute(java.awt.image.BufferedImage original)
        Creates a map of the 32x24 Spectrum attribute set for two screens. For each attribute block it finds the closest (best fitting) gigascreen palette of 4 colours.
